arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of Glue Workflow

defaultRunProperties.description: A map of default run properties for this workflow. These properties are passed to all jobs associated to the workflow.

maxConcurrentRuns.description: Prevents exceeding the maximum number of concurrent runs of any of the component jobs. If you leave this parameter blank, there is no limit to the number of concurrent workflow runs.

name.description: The name you assign to this workflow.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
